7000.name: The Fissure Under The Ledge
7000.description:
This is a small fissure in the solid rock. Under you lies the deep dark
pool. The water trickles quietly down from the ledge above. The
water smells like the water in a sewer. The path is steep and
treacherous. The air is thin and cold at this altitude.

7001.name: The Muddy Sewer
7001.description:
This is mud to your knees. This is not the kind of place for a picnic.
The muddy sewer stretches further into the south. Snow clings to
shadowed crevices. The air is thin and cold at this altitude.

south.description: You see the muddy sewer continuing into the darkness to the south.

7002.name: The Muddy Sewer Junction
7002.description:
The muddy sewer stretches into the dark to the south. It looks as if no
person has ever put his foot here before. It is too muddy for that
anyway. The sewer leads north, south and east from here. Bare rock
dominates the landscape. The wind howls around exposed peaks.

north.description: The muddy sewer stretches into the dark to the north.

south.description: South.  The muddy sewer ends in a mudhole that way.

east.description: East.  The muddy sewer leads into a bend that goes south.

7003.name: The Mudhole
7003.description:
The area opens in mud all the way up to your thighs and it is not too
comfortable since you are used to a somewhat different environment. The
sewer leads to the north of here. In the middle you can just make out an
enormous drainpipe leading down. The path is steep and treacherous. The
air is thin and cold at this altitude.

north.description: North.  The muddy junction lies in that direction.

down.description: The muddy drainpipe leads down through the mud, otherwise it is utterly dark.

7004.name: The Dark Pit
7004.description:
The area opens by the edge of a dark pit that leads down into even
deeper darkness. >BWWAAADDRR< - The smell from down there is unbearable.
The sewer stretches into the darkness to the east. The walls are rough-
hewn and cold to the touch. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

east.description: East.  The sewer leads into the sewer junction.

down.description: The Dark Pit leads down and down and down... well you can't see the  bottom anyway.  There are bars that could function as a ladder on the side.

7005.name: The Muddy Sewer
7005.description:
This is the middle of a bend of the sewer pipe. It is very dark around
here and the mud is sticking to your legs, not very pleasant. The pipe
leads east and south from here. Rocks jut from the grassy slopes. The
view stretches for miles in every direction.

east.description: East.  The mud stretches on into the darkness.

south.description: South.  There is even more mud in that direction than where you are now.   Incredible.

7006.name: The Muddy Sewer
7006.description:
This is something that reminds you very much of porridge, this has the
advantage that it is not hot, it is rather cold actually. The pipe bends
to the north and east. The wind howls around exposed peaks. Bare rock
dominates the landscape.

east.description: The pipe leads into a bend that goes south.  Interesting, there is mud on the ground there as well.

north.description: The muddy sewer pipe leads into a bend that goes east.

7007.name: The Muddy Sewer Bend
7007.description:
This isn't your idea of a place to stay too long. You're in up to your
knees in something that resembles mud, but you're not quite sure. The
bend in which you stand leads west and south. The air is thin and cold
at this altitude. Bare rock dominates the landscape.

west.description: The pipe (still filled with mud) leads into a intersection that goes north  and south.  Interesting.

south.description: The pipe leads into a intersection that goes south and east.  The floor here  is still covered in mud.

7008.name: A Muddy Intersection
7008.description:
You have both your feet safely stuck in mud. It isn't the mud that is
wrong it is the smell, the sounds, the total darkness that surrounds
you. Everything here is so depressing. The pipe leads on with a trail of
thick mud to the north, east and south. Sheep trails wind between the
hillocks. The view stretches for miles in every direction.

north.description: North.  The pipe goes into a bend with a load of mud all the way up the walls. The bend leads west.

east.description: East.  This way looks like a place for the annual mud festival, although the stench wouldn't allow any happiness at all.  The pipe leads into a bend that leads north.

south.description: South.  There is much less mud in that direction.  Your light doesn't  uncover enough space for you to see much more than that it leads into some sort of junction.

7009.name: The Sewer Junction
7009.description:
The area opens in the middle of a huge junction of sewer pipes right
under what you'd think was an air shaft. The sewer pipes lead to the
north, south, east and west. It look quite impossible to force your way
up. The scent of pine and earth fills the air. The forest floor is
carpeted with fallen leaves.

north.description: North.  Mud is the floor basis in that direction.  Yummy.

east.description: YYEEUUCH!  BOOH!  THAT looks like a nice place for creepy crawlies.

south.description: South.  This direction looks quite nice actually.  The pipe leads into  a bend that goes east.

west.description: A few yards ahead - away from this junction - there is a pit leading down, but the smell from there...>PHEWW<.

7010.name: A Bend In The Sewer Pipe
7010.description:
This is a bend in the sewer pipe. A strong smell seeps in from the
north. The sewer goes north and east. A maintenance panel to the north
is bolted shut. The ground is soft underfoot. The air is fresh and
clean.

north.description: A narrow maintenance panel.
north.reveal_message: You find a bolted maintenance panel set into the wall.

east.description: East.  The Pipe leads into utter darkness that way.

7011.name: The Muddy Sewer Pipe
7011.description:
The entrance opens to a kind of tube intersection that leads south, west
and east. Your legs are covered in mud up to the knees. REAL yucky! The
path is steep and treacherous. Snow clings to shadowed crevices.

east.description: East.  There is less mud in that direction, or that's your impression.

south.description: That way is lost in darkness, though you sense less mud in that direction, perhaps even a complete end to this sludge that surrounds you.

west.description: West.  The mud reaches that way too, all the way up the walls.

7012.name: The Bend In The Muddy Sewer
7012.description:
This is not your idea of a holiday. The area opens in mud up to your
knees. It is absolutely inconceivable how all this mud could have been
placed here. The pipe leads to the west and south. The path is steep and
treacherous. The air is thin and cold at this altitude.

south.description: South.  There is even more mud that way, incredible!  Although it looks like an intersection in the sewer system that leads east and south.

west.description: West.  All you can see, is that the pipe leads into a bend that goes north.  But there is less mud in that direction, however odd that sounds.

7013.name: A Muddy Intersection
7013.description:
You wouldn't want to know the true feeling of standing in this mud up to
your hips. >BWAADR<. All that fills your mind right now is the dream of
a hot bath. This is NOT very clean mud you know, remember you're in the
sewer! The pipes leads north, south and east. The wind howls around
exposed peaks. The air is thin and cold at this altitude.

north.description: North.  Sludge and sediment fills this corridor of the sewer that leads into a bend going west.

east.description: East.  You can see absolutely nothing of interest in that direction (Maybe that is why it is so damn interesting...)  There is no mud in that direction either, GREAT!

south.description: South.  All you can see is more mud!  Although the pipe goes into a bend leading west.

7014.name: The Muddy Sewer
7014.description:
The area opens in a bend of the pipe system of the sewer with mud up to
your thighs. Contemplating a higher level of existence here would be
utterly inappropriate, as the smell would keep any intelligent creature
from even thinking of anything but getting away from this foul end of
the WORLD. The bend goes from north to west. Bare rock dominates the
landscape. The wind howls around exposed peaks.

north.description: North.  Filled with mud, that place looks like an impassable intersection with pipes leading north and east.

west.description: West.  There is less mud that way, maybe you're on your way out of this foul place.

7015.name: The Old Well
7015.description:
The area opens by an old and worn well from before this century. The
sewer leads to the east from here and the well leads down into darkness.
Metal bars implanted in the side of the well lead down as a ladder. Bird
calls echo through the canopy. The scent of pine and earth fills the
air.

east.description: East.  You see, because of the utter darkness that surround you, absolutely nothing.  Your light isn't of much use for that kind of distance.

down.description: Down the well there is even less light than up here, so... sorry, you can't see a thing.  There are metal bars in the side leading down into the darkness.

7016.name: The Ordinary Bend
7016.description:
This is the middle of a bend in the pipe system of the sewer system,
WHAT a place!!! The pipe leads to the south and the east. The sounds of
city life echo around. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless
feet.

south.description: South.  You see nothing at all in that direction it is too dark anyway.

east.description: East.  What a quiet place you've found there.  It is an intersection that has pipeways going north and east.

7017.name: The Sewer Junction
7017.description:
This is a junction that leads north, west and south. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past. The sounds of city life echo around. The bustle
of urban life surrounds this area. Voices and footsteps echo from nearby
streets.

north.description: North.  You see a bend.

west.description: West.  There is a junction with four pipelines in that direction.

south.description: South.  It looks like a pipe junction just like this one.  Only that one leads east and west.

7018.name: The Ordinary Junction
7018.description:
This looks like an ordinary junction, actually it seems very quiet here.
The pipelines lead west, east and north. The sounds of city life echo
around. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: To the north you can see a junction like this one, leading north and west.

east.description: To the east there is nothing of particular interest, though there is a  junction with pipelines leading north and east.

west.description: There is a bend to the west leading north.

7021.name: A Quiet Pipe Junction
7021.description:
This is the kind of place to rest, though the smell could be a LOT
better than this. The sewer goes east, north and west from here. The
smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. The sounds of city life
echo around.

north.description: In that direction, you can't see anything.  It is just too dark.

east.description: There is an ordinary junction in the pipe system to the east.

west.description: West.  There is an ordinary bend leading south into the sewer system in that direction.

7022.name: The Odd Room With Smooth Walls
7022.description:
As you enter you hear a loud click from one of the walls... and you fall
and fall and fall... . . . . ... And come to an abrupt end. THIS is
strange indeed. There is an arched entryway leading down. Bare rock
dominates the landscape. The air is thin and cold at this altitude.

down.description: Down.  It is utterly dark that way, though you can make out an intersection of sewer pipes leading west, north and east.

7024.name: The Sewer
7024.description:
This is mud up to your ankles. This is an intersection with sewer pipes
leading east, south and west. The sounds of city life echo around. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

east.description: To the east there is a peculiar looking round room.

south.description: To the south there is another intersection with pipes going south and east.

west.description: To the west there is another intersection like this one, with sewer pipes leading south and west.

7025.name: Another Intersection
7025.description:
You have never seen anything so BORING... This is an intersection with
pipes leading north, south and east. The smell of smoke and humanity
hangs in the air. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: To the north there is an intersection, where the pipes are leading west and east.  You notice that the floor to the west is covered in mud.

east.description: East.  You see nothing of interest in that direction, just another  intersection.  This one leads east and south.

south.description: Another intersection lies to the south.  It leads west and south.

7026.name: A Junction
7026.description:
This one seems interesting, a big difference from all the other
junctions. It seems cleaner than the rest of them. Weird. Something that
looks like an air shaft leads upwards, but it looks far too slippery to
climb. The pipes lead to the south, west and north. Dust motes drift in
the stale air. Shadows gather in the corners.

north.description: North.  You see an intersection there, leading north and east.

south.description: To the south there is ANOTHER junction leading west and east.

west.description: To the west you see a load of mud and sediment in the sewer.  That should be an intersection there but you're not quite sure.

7028.name: The Sewer Junction
7028.description:
The area opens in a junction of sewer pipes leading north, east and
west. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. Buildings crowd together on
all sides.

east.description: To the east you can see a bend in the pipe going south.

west.description: To the west you can just make out an old well.

7029.name: The Triple Junction
7029.description:
The area opens in the middle of a huge junction of concrete sewer pipes.
The pipes lead into three different directions: east, south and west.
The sounds of city life echo around. The smell of smoke and humanity
hangs in the air.

east.description: East.  You can see a bend in the sewer pipe leading north.

south.description: To the south there is an ENORMOUS quadruple sewer junction, all lit up by an odd light.

west.description: To the west you can just make out another junction similar to the one  you are standing in.

7030.name: The Quadruple Junction Under The Dump
7030.description:
This is something that reminds you of an entry to an ant hive. There are
enormous concrete pipes leading north, south, east and west. There is
also a metal ladder built into the concrete wall leading up through a
layer of garbage. Faint chanting echoes from a shadowed alcove to the
west. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: To the north you can see a huge triple junction with sewer pipes leading west and east.

east.description: East.  You can see a pit in the floor.

south.description: To the south there is a huge junction with pipes leading east and west.

west.description: A narrow arch hidden by grime.
west.reveal_message: Arcane residue peels away the grime, revealing a hidden arch west.

up.description: Up through the garbage you can just make out what looks like the dump in Midgaard.

7031.name: A Triple Junction
7031.description:
The area opens in a junction with pipes leading west, north and east.
Buildings crowd together on all sides. Vendors and pedestrians bustle
past.

north.description: To the north there is an ENORMOUS quadruple sewer junction, all lit up by an odd light.

east.description: East.  You can just make out a triple junction leading north and east.

west.description: West.  You can just make out a triple junction leading north and west.

7034.name: A Bend In The Sewer Pipe
7034.description:
You can look in two directions where the pipe leads: south and west. The
ground is soft underfoot. The air is fresh and clean. The open terrain
stretches out, grass swaying in the breeze. The sky hangs vast overhead.

west.description: West.  You can just make out a triple junction leading north and west.

south.description: To the south you can see another bend leading west.

7035.name: The Sewer Pipe Bend
7035.description:
You can look in two different directions where the pipe goes: west and
north. The ground is soft underfoot. The air is fresh and clean. The
open terrain stretches out, grass swaying in the breeze. The sky hangs
vast overhead.

north.description: North.  You see another bend leading west.

west.description: You can see another junction although this one is a triple one with pipes going south and west.

7036.name: The Pit
7036.description:
The area opens in a section of a pipe that leads to a dead end. In the
floor there is a pit leading down. There are bars set in the side of the
pit wall functioning as a ladder. Bare rock dominates the landscape. The
air is thin and cold at this altitude.

west.description: West.  You can see a dimly lit quadruple junction with an exit up.

down.description: Down the pit it is so utterly dark that you can't see a thing.

7037.name: The Round Room
7037.description:
As you enter the room it starts rotating - at first slowly, then faster
and faster - You get totally confused as to where up and down is, but
The area is certain that the doorway is in the opposite direction of
what it was when you entered. It now leads east. There is only this one
exit. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The smell of smoke and
humanity hangs in the air.

east.description: You can just make out a smaller room with a chair.

7038.name: The Three Way Junction
7038.description:
This is a junction of pipes that lead west, east and south. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. The sounds of city life
echo around.

east.description: East.  You can make out a dimly lit Guard Room.

south.description: To the south you can see what looks like a store room.

west.description: West.  You see another junction similar to this one leading north and south.

7039.name: The Sewer Store Room
7039.description:
The area opens in a small room lit by a single torch set in the wall.
The only way out of here is to the north. The sounds of city life echo
around. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: To the north you see a pipe junction.

7041.name: The Shaft
7041.description:
The area opens by the edge of a deep, dark shaft leading down. A single
ladder is your tool to work your way down if you so wish. The sewer pipe
leads south from here. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The smell of
smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

south.description: To the south you can see the pipe leading further south into darkness.

down.description: Down and utter darkness.  There is absolutely nothing to be seen in that  direction.

7043.name: The Sewer Entrance
7043.description:
The area opens in the middle of a pipe that leads from north to south.
Above you an air shaft leads up into sunlight. It seems totally
impossible to go up that way. Buildings crowd together on all sides. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: To the north you can just make out a huge shaft leading down.

south.description: To the south you can see a triple junction leading west and east.

7044.name: The Junction Going Three Ways
7044.description:
This is a passageway in the pipes of the sewer system leading north,
east and west. The sounds of city life echo around. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: You see a sewer pipe leading north.

west.description: West.  You see another junction very similar to this one that leads north and west.

7045.name: The Sewer Room
7045.description:
This is a large room with chairs set in the walls. You have the feeling
of being watched. To the south there is an entrance to a larger room.
The room is lit by five torches, also set in the walls. To the west
there is a doorway leading out to the sewers. Buildings crowd together
on all sides. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

south.description: You can see an even larger room than this one, filled with light.

west.description: To the west you can see the sewers.

7046.name: The Sewer Room
7046.description:
This is a Room with walls that glitters like gold though not quite like
it. This is strange as it looks as if the glitter lights the whole room.
It looks very bright. To the south the floor is covered with yucky
water. The north leads to a sort of a guard room. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: To the north you can see the guard room.

south.description: To the south there is nothing but water and an exit leads east from there.

7047.name: The Pool In The Sewer
7047.description:
The area opens in water to your waist. To the north is the entrance to
this room. A single door leads east. Vendors and pedestrians bustle
past. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: To the north you see the entrance to this room.

east.description: You can see an enormous hall through the doorway.

7048.name: The Sewers
7048.description:
The area opens in a dead end of the sewer. The only way out is south.
You can see a shaft leading up but it looks too difficult to go up that
way. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. The sounds of
city life echo around.

7049.name: The Junction
7049.description:
The area opens in a junction leading north, west and east. The sounds of
city life echo around. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.
The bustle of urban life surrounds this area. Voices and footsteps echo
from nearby streets.

east.description: Darkness has closed in on that part of the sewer system, you can't see a thing in that direction.

west.description: West.  You see another junction very similar to this one that leads north and west.

7050.name: The Small Room
7050.description:
The only thing in this room of interest is a chair, and that appears to
have been bolted to the rock floor. A doorway leads south and another
leads east into darkness. A cracked section of wall to the east smells
faintly of oil. The sounds of city life echo around. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past.

east.description: A loose brick slides aside.
east.reveal_message: You pry the loose brick free, revealing a hidden cache to the east.

south.description: You can see a room with a lot of light in it.  You can't make out any details.

7051.name: The Sewer Pipe
7051.description:
This is what reminds you of a foul sewer, as if you liked being here!
Visible is two exits leading either north or south. Buildings crowd
together on all sides. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless
feet.

south.description: To the south you can see a strange light flowing from there.

7052.name: The Grand Sewer
7052.description:
This is a grand sewer pipe. This stretches toward the south. It is large
indeed! A doorway leads to the east from here. Buildings crowd together
on all sides. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: To the north you can see a doorway.

east.description: You can't see anything in that darkness.

south.description: In the south end of the pipe the "floor" is completely covered with water.

7053.name: The South End Of The Grand Pipe
7053.description:
The area opens in water to your knees. A doorway leads west from here.
The pipe stretches north. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless
feet. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: You see a lot of pictures decorating the walls.

7055.name: The Edge Of The Water Sewer
7055.description:
The area opens in a room where half of the floor is covered in water.
The water leads east and a doorway leads west. The forest floor is
carpeted with fallen leaves. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the
light.

east.description: You can hardly make out much more than that the next place is in a pipe  with more water.

7056.name: The Dark Hallway
7056.description:
You can't see much of this, even with a light. The hallway goes into a
passageway to the south. A doorway leads west. The smell of smoke and
humanity hangs in the air. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

south.description: You can see nothing at all because it is completely dark in that direction.

west.description: You see a lot of light, bright as daylight, but nothing of interest.

7057.name: The Dark Passageway
7057.description:
You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet. The
passageway seems to continue south and north. Vendors and pedestrians
bustle past. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

south.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

7058.name: The Dark Passageway
7058.description:
You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet. The
passageway seems to continue south and north. The cobblestones are worn
smooth by countless feet. The sounds of city life echo around.

north.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

south.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

7059.name: The Dark Passageway
7059.description:
You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet. The
passageway seems to continue south and north. Vendors and pedestrians
bustle past. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

south.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

7060.name: The Dark Passageway
7060.description:
You can't see anything but the ground where you put your feet. The
passageway seems to continue west and north. To the east there is water
covering the floor and that leads through an arched entry to a watery
sewer. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

east.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

west.description: You can just make out a triple junction leading north and west.

7061.name: The Watery Sewer Bend
7061.description:
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The
sewer seems to bend and lead south and west. The path is steep and
treacherous. Snow clings to shadowed crevices.

south.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

west.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

7062.name: The Watery Sewer
7062.description:
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The
sewer seems to lead south and north. The air is thin and cold at this
altitude. Snow clings to shadowed crevices.

north.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

south.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

7063.name: The Watery Sewer
7063.description:
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The
sewer seems to lead south and north. The wind howls around exposed
peaks. The path is steep and treacherous.

north.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

south.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

7064.name: The Watery Sewer Junction
7064.description:
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The
sewer seems to lead into a junction going south, north and east. The air
is thin and cold at this altitude. The wind howls around exposed peaks.

north.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

east.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

south.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

7065.name: The Watery Sewer
7065.description:
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The
sewer seems to lead south and north. The path is steep and treacherous.
Snow clings to shadowed crevices.

north.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

south.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

7066.name: The Watery Sewer Junction
7066.description:
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The
sewer seems to lead into a junction that goes north, south and east. The
air is thin and cold at this altitude. The wind howls around exposed
peaks.

north.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

east.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

south.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

7067.name: The Watery Sewer
7067.description:
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The
sewer seems to lead south and north. Bare rock dominates the landscape.
Snow clings to shadowed crevices.

north.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

south.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

7068.name: The Watery Sewer Bend
7068.description:
You can't see anything but the water you're in up to your hips. The
sewer seems to bend and lead west and north. The path is steep and
treacherous. The wind howls around exposed peaks.

north.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

west.description: You can't see anything in that direction and your light isn't enough to light that far.

7069.name: A Ledge By A Dark Pool
7069.description:
You can't see much here but the echo tells you that there is quite a
drop down. You can just make out a huge dark pool out there in the
darkness, mostly because of the trickling of water. The water from the
sewer actually washes over this ledge and makes it quite slippery. From
here it drops, like a waterfall, into the pool far down. The path is
steep and treacherous. Bare rock dominates the landscape.

south.description: You can't see a thing.  It is too dark.

west.description: You can't see a thing.  It is too dark.

7070.name: A Ledge By A Dark Pool
7070.description:
You can't see much here but the echo tells you that there is quite a
drop down. You can just make out a huge dark pool out there in the
darkness, mostly because of the trickling of water. The water from the
sewer actually washes over this ledge and makes it quite slippery. From
here it drops, like a waterfall, into the pool far down. Under you there
is a small fissure in the rock. It seems big enough to contain a few
people. The pool reflects a dark opening beneath the water. The wind
howls around exposed peaks. The path is steep and treacherous.

north.description: You can't see a thing.  It is too dark.

west.description: You can't see a thing.  It is too dark.

down.description: A submerged tunnel drops below the ledge.
down.reveal_message: You discover a submerged tunnel leading down.

7071.name: The Smuggler's Cache
7071.description:
A dry chamber stacked with old crates and smuggler markings. A
waterproof coffer sits in the corner. The air is still and musty. The
ceiling hangs low overhead.

west.description: The loose brick passage leads back west.

7072.name: The Sunken Vault
7072.description:
Water drips from the ceiling of this submerged vault. A rusted chain
hangs from a ring in the ceiling. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to
the touch. The air is still and musty.

up.description: You climb back up to the ledge.

7073.name: A Maintenance Alcove
7073.description:
Dusty tools line a narrow alcove. A water-stained logbook rests on a
crate. The air is still and musty. Dust motes drift in the stale air.
The air is stale and the walls close. Shadows pool in the corners,
undisturbed.

south.description: The panel opens back to the sewer bend.

7074.name: The Forgotten Chapel
7074.description:
Soot-blackened stones form a tiny chapel. Candles burned down to the
wick line a cracked altar. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Shadows
gather in the corners.

east.description: The arch returns to the sewer junction.

7099.name: The Threshold Of The Necropolis
7099.description: Ancient iron gates stand before you, rusted but still imposing. Beyond them lies the Necropolis of Eternal Night, a place of darkness and undeath. Cold air seeps through the bars.

7000.name: mudmonster
7000.long_desc: A horrifying Mudmonster is slowly evolving from the mud...
7000.description:
It sure looks like something out of a horror movie.  It strongly resembles
a huge figure made up from mud alone, and it sure looks like it had human 
flesh for breakfast and is strongly intent on having the same for dinner
- Perhaps you?

7001.name: bat
7001.long_desc: The small fierce-looking bat is hanging from the ceiling, obviously sleeping.
7001.description:
You have never in your entire life seen such a mean looking small creature,
though it looks rather peaceful, hanging there, sleeping.  The thought of 
arousing this cruel creature doesn't sit well in your bones.

7002.name: rat
7002.long_desc: The huge hungry-looking sewer rat sits here.
7002.description:
This creature is fairly large for a rat, but not so big that it could
be called a giant rat.  Sewer water drips off of its grey fur as it
looks at you with black glistening eyes.

7003.name: spider
7003.long_desc: The small hairy Spider is here, busy with its web.
7003.description:
This small spider seems to pay you no attention at all as it builds
its intricately designed web.

7004.name: beetle
7004.long_desc: The giant, mean-looking earth beetle is here.
7004.description:
Now, you've seen beetles, but this one is enormous.  It stretches
perhaps two feet from head to tail.  As it notices you, it waves
its six legs about and makes some strange skittering noises at you.

7005.name: maggot
7005.long_desc: The giant maggot is here, simply existing.
7005.description:
This large mound of grotesque flesh is just lying here quivering,
almost as if it can sense your warm blood nearby.

7006.name: snake
7006.long_desc: The snake slithers towards you. It looks very mean.
7006.description:
This snake is of a variety that you do not recall seeing recently.
It has near black skin with small white diamond shaped spots all
over its head and upper body.  A thin green stripe stretches along
each side of its body.

7007.name: wanderer
7007.long_desc: The evil wanderer stares at you with a piercing gaze.
7007.description:
The evil wanderer is very thin.  He is dressed in a grey cloak.  He
doesn't look like he'd be your first choice as a travelling companion.

7008.name: homunculus
7008.long_desc: The creature homunculus is here, looking at you with an evil look.
7008.description:
The homunculus appears in a man-like form, about eighteen inches tall,
has a greenish, reptilian skin, leathery wings, and a batlike mouth,
with teeth dripping with a greenish sludge.

7009.name: morkoth
7009.long_desc: The morkoth are standing here, waiting for someone to KILL!
7009.description:
It is a five foot tall, shadow monster.  This has the shape between
a human and a rat.  It breaths very heavily while staring at you.

7010.name: chr-eff'n
7010.long_desc: The chr-eff'n are crawling here, looking around with its yellow eyes.
7010.description:
The head and torso of a chr-eff'n is copper-covered, with yellow,
glowing eyes.  The lower body is in an orange shading.

7040.name: dragon
7040.long_desc: The fierce-looking red dragon stares at you angrily.
7040.description:
The red dragon stares at you, angrily, as it wakes when you arrive.
It says 'Oh, human YOU woke me up... Hsssss', while it moves closer,
'Can one NEVER sleep in peace... Hssss... '

7041.name: hag
7041.long_desc: A sea hag is here, swimming around.
7041.description:
The sea hag is so ghastly looking that you feel the deepest fear:  Big
yellow eyes and sharp teeth.  Its ears are very big, and it has small
sharp horns.  This beast is obviously a hater of beauty.

7042.name: naga
7042.long_desc: The guardian naga looks kindly at you.
7042.description:
The naga are a snake-liked creature.  She is covered in green-gold scales
with silvery triangles along her back.  Her eyes are golden.  She notices
that you are staring at her, and she says 'Watch out.  This way leads to
some evil creatures.'

7043.name: basilisk
7043.long_desc: The scaled basilisk crawls towards you slowly.
7043.description:
The basilisk is a reptilian monster.  It has eight legs, and a strong,
toothy jaws.  It is dull brown with yellowish underbelly.  Its eyes are
glowing pale green.

7044.name: lemure
7044.long_desc: The lemure blob slithers towards you for an attack!
7044.description:
This looks like a vaguely human blob.  Big black yellow eyes, and a mouth
going a little bit out from the face.  The lemure does not look interested
in you at all, but it attacks anyway.  It looks like its mind has been
burned out.

7045.name: jones
7045.long_desc: Jones is standing here glaring at you.
7045.description:
At the first sight you thought Jones was an Orc, but when he came closer you
see his second head.  He wears an animal skin dress, filthy and moth eaten. 
Jones really stinks...

7046.name: herald
7046.long_desc: Herald is standing here looking confused at you.
7046.description:
When you look at Herald, you feel pity.  His clothes are really poor, and
one of his heads hangs down.  At the rope around his stomach hangs dead
mice and rats.  He does not smell good.

7047.name: sewer hag
7047.long_desc: A hideous hag cackles from the shadows.
7047.description: This wretched creature was once human, perhaps, but now is twisted beyond recognition. Green-tinged skin hangs loosely from her skeletal frame, and her eyes gleam with malevolent cunning. She reeks of decay and dark magic.

7048.name: greater basilisk
7048.long_desc: A massive basilisk coils here, its eyes gleaming dangerously.
7048.description: This basilisk is larger and more ancient than its lesser kin. Its scales are dark as obsidian and its deadly gaze seems even more potent.

7100.name: a smuggler's manifest
7100.room_desc: A damp smuggler's manifest is tucked into a crate.
7100.description: The ink lists deliveries and bribes in a tight hand.
7100.lore_text: "Three crates to the north gate. Pay the watchman in silver, not gold."

7101.name: a sewer worker's log
7101.description: The pages are swollen with damp.
7101.lore_text: "The old chapel keeps echoing at night. We sealed it, but the chanting never stopped."

7102.name: a waterproof coffer
7102.description: Tarred seams keep the water out.

7103.name: a brass maintenance key
7103.room_desc: A brass key gleams faintly in the muck.
7103.description: The key is stamped with a sewer sigil.

7104.name: a rat-king token
7104.room_desc: A tarnished token lies in the sludge.
7104.description: A worn coin etched with a rat crown.

7105.name: a glowmoss lantern
7105.room_desc: A lantern packed with glowmoss hangs here.
7105.description: The lantern gives off a soft green light.
